scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:ts && pnpm run lint:rust
scripts.ci:web: pnpm run lint:ts && pnpm test && pnpm run build
scripts.ci:rust: pnpm run fmt:rust && pnpm run lint:rust && pnpm run test:rust
scripts.ci: pnpm run ci:web && pnpm run ci:rust
scripts.test: pnpm run test:contracts && pnpm run test:policy
scripts.test:all: pnpm run test && pnpm run test:text-guards
scripts.test:text-guards: node --test tests/adapter-boundaries.test.mjs tests/cli-detectors.test.mjs tests/client-install-guides.test.mjs tests/client-status-ui-behavior.test.mjs tests/command-boundary.test.mjs tests/desktop-detectors.test.mjs tests/gui-shell.test.mjs tests/mcp-manager-panel.test.mjs tests/recovery-ux.test.mjs tests/redaction-policy.test.mjs tests/skills-manager-panel.test.mjs tests/slide-over-panel.test.mjs tests/snackbar-ui.test.mjs
